description: Save the current game. Will throw a script error if multiple saves are attempted in the same frame.

params.name: filename
description: The name of the file. If not used then the file will be automatically named.

params.name: screenshot
description: The name of the screenshot file. If not used then the file will be automatically named.

params.name: supressPlayerNotify
description: When true, player will not get a "Checkpoint Reached" print on their screen.
